description.en: ROAD TO NINJA NARUTO THE MOVIE The new shocking movie Naruto fans from all over the world have been waiting for. MOVIE 9: ROAD TO NARUTO THE MOVIE A special one-shot connected to the movie!? Read the manga, watch the movie and find the connections!!

After facing off the last of the Otsutsuki clan members a forbidden seal activates on the last descendant’s body sending Naruto back into the past before his change began. Naruto is back in the academy with a few days remaining before the academy graduation exam. Naruto now has the opportunity to relive either as a loser who became the hero or awaken as a reborn genius that surpassed all his peers and changes the future.
SonGoku is stuck in the narutoverse

description.en: The story of Namikaze Minato (Fourth Hokage), the winner of the world-wide popularity poll project--NARUTOP99! Just how exactly did Minato, the father of Naruto, develop a certain jutsu...?
description.uk: Історія Намікадзе Мінато (Четвертого Хокаґе), переможця всесвітнього опитування популярності персонажів - NARUTOP99! Як саме Мінато, батько Наруто, розвинув певне джюцу...?

description.en: The Naruto spin-off novel is now a manga series! The retired Kakashi and Guy head to a hot springs in the Land of Hot Water with their bodyguard, Sarutobi Mirai! A story connecting two generations through the power of bonds!
description.id: Novel spin-off Naruto sekarang menjadi seri manga!  Pensiunan Kakashi dan Guy menuju ke mata air panas di Negeri Uap dengan pengawal mereka, Sarutobi Mirai!  Sebuah kisah yang menghubungkan dua generasi melalui kekuatan ikatan!
description.pt-br: O romance spin-off de Naruto agora é uma série de mangá! Os aposentados Kakashi e Guy vão para uma fonte termal no País do Vapor com sua guarda-costas, Sarutobi Mirai! Uma história que conecta duas gerações através do poder dos laços!

altTitles.ja: うちはサスケの写輪眼伝

description.en: The series, drawn in "SD" style, stars Sasuke Uchiha and shows the humorous side of him and Taka.
description.pt-br:
O rival de Naruto, mais bonito do que você já viu antes!

Sasuke Uchiha, o lobo solitário que fará de tudo para vingar seu clã e matar seu irmão mais velho… Sim, esta é a história dele, mas com uma reviravolta hilária! Em Naruto: Chibi Sasuke Sharingan Legend, os personagens e a história foram completamente transformadas por uma questão de comédia! Com seus companheiros da Equipe Taka, Suigetsu, Karin e Jugo, Sasuke viaja por todos os lados e entra em todos os tipos de aventuras malucas. Este é um lado de Sasuke que você nunca viu antes. Um conselho: não subestime os Uchihas!

altTitles.en: NARUTO Hiden: Retsu no Sho - Official Movie Guidebook

description.en:
By checking Sai's books about proper human interaction, Naruto learns that men are supposed to pay for everything on a date. When he takes Hinata out to a restaurant, however, he is intimidated by how expensive the food is.

This entry is an omake chapter set after the events of The Last: Naruto the Movie which is included with the Retsu no Sho official movie guidebook

Its English translation is included with limited edition copies of The Last.
